short_summary: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires specialized professional resources for Application Development and Maintenance Services.
description: The Canadian government department is seeking expertise in application maintenance, development, and support services for tier 1 business applications.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

---

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-661-20509534
* **Solicitation Number**: 01B68-23-2534
* **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 27, 2023, 12:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: October 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Service Requirements

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking task-based informatics professional services for the development, maintenance, and support of tier 1 business applications.

### Tender Evaluation

The tender evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Tender Conditions

* The tender is open to competitive selective tendering.
* The tender has expired.

### Contracting Entity

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0C5 Canada

### Contact Information

* Val Judenne, 5555
* Email: [val.judenne@agr.gc.ca](mailto:val.judenne@agr.gc.ca)
* Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0C5 Canada

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the CanadaBuys website.

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22184/01b68-23-2534-npp-tbips-english.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22184/01b68-23-2534_apm-spict-francais.pdf>

Please note that this is a rewritten text based on the original document, which had several errors and inconsistencies. For the sake of clarity, I have kept the information as concise as possible and avoided including unnecessary details. If you need further clarification or corrections, please let me know. 

Let me know if I can assist you further. 

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Expert Technical Writer. 

```
